Telepresence explicitly provides allocentric perspective

Last updated on July 4, 2021

Connect to a live drone feed through a headset, and you’re forced to explicitly shift your egocentric perspective to an allocentric one. Do the same with a robot specifically design to connect you to a physical venue, and you get the same result. Telepresence explicitly provides a third-person perspective.

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ESVBW7yAyY
